title: Water supply error
description: Samsung washer error indicating water supply issues. Check water inlet hoses and water pressure.

title: Water drain error
description: Samsung washer error indicating drainage problems. Check drain hose for clogs or kinks.

title: Motor error
description: LG washer error indicating motor issues. May require motor replacement or control board repair.

title: Drain error
description: LG washer error indicating drainage issues. Check drain pump filter and drain hose.

title: Long drain error
description: Whirlpool washer error indicating slow drainage. Clean drain pump and check for obstructions.

title: Water in base pan
description: Bosch dishwasher error indicating water leakage into base pan. Check for leaks and clear water.

title: Drain error
description: Bosch dishwasher error indicating drainage problems. Check drain hose and air gap.

title: Ice maker fan error
description: Frigidaire refrigerator error indicating ice maker fan issues. Check fan motor and connections.

title: Evaporator fan error
description: Frigidaire refrigerator error indicating evaporator fan problems. Check fan motor and wiring.

title: Main control board error
description: Maytag washer error indicating control board failure. May require board replacement.
